channel.title: Need help with trade
channel.description:
ok my server is up and running but when people trade it turns both the offering into watering cans and when you accept it always says that the other person is tradeing a d chain(when there not) does anyone know how to fix this
also when people where d chain they go invisable how i change that? need to go eat my tea brb
